game.name: Cooking Simulator VR
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 차세대 VR 주방에 들어가 최고의 셰프가 되세요. 사실적인 물리와 100개 이상의 레시피, 자연스러운 컨트롤로 요리를 마스터하세요 — 또는 화재와 폭발, 샌드박스 자유로 혼돈을 즐기세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into VR kitchen and become supreme Chef. Master realistic cooking with lifelike physics, 100+ recipes, 140+ ingredients and natural VR controls — or embrace chaos with fires, explosions, and sandbox freedom.
